channel.title: How to make items not dropable? [PI] [DPVPZ]
channel.description: Hey guys, i've been looking around on google, and other forums, I can't find a way to players not be able to drop, I don't want anyone to be able to drop items. If anyone could help me with this. That would be great. Source is deathlypvpz

item.title: How to make items not dropable? [PI] [DPVPZ]
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Dropping item packet

Look for the class where it’s handled and just add an if statement

if (itemID == #)
return;

Read full topic
item.source: How to make items not dropable? [PI] [DPVPZ]
